subject: SUNTRUST BANK
body:
SUNTRUST BANK
711 5th Ave New York NY 10022.
Internal Affairs Department New York.
NOTIFICATION OF CREDIT FROM SUNTRUST BANK.
TO YOUR ATTENTION!!
In a recent meeting held with the IMF Director concerning debt
reconciliation, this is to inform you that we have agreed to release
your fund worth (US$15,400,000.00) which will come via Global
Automatic Teller Machine debit master Card as instructed from our
headquarter by Mrs.Kristalina Georgieva, Director of the International
Monetary Fund (IMF).
I will clearly inform you that after the meeting we had with the IMF
director Mrs.Kristalina Georgieva, we have agreed to release your fund
worth (US$15,400,000.00) via Global Automatic Teller Machine debit
master Card. Meanwhile 
all you have to do is to pay a file renewal
payment fee of US$50 Apple gift card to enable us to reopen your
payment files for immediate release of your overdue payment.
However, the below information is needed as to enable the profiling of
your ATM card and it's delivery to you:
Full Name:
Age:
Phone Number:
Address:
Once we receive this payment $50 only, we will proceed with the
delivery without delay.
Anticipating your prompt response.
Yours in Service,
Aleem Gillani,
The SunTrust Bank Chief Financial Officer.

subject: Re: SUNTRUST BANK
body:
Hello Aleem Gillani,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about the fund release. It's quite a surprise! 

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please explain why the payment is being made through an Apple gift card? Also, could you provide more details about this meeting with the IMF Director? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Maria
